title: Staff
content:

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

Main Hand OnlyTopple

Gnarled, finger-like roots encase the gemstone at the top of this staff.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Staff is one of the Quarterstaves Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges,
